row.entry: The velvia module enhances image saturation. Its effect is tailored to increase saturation less on lower saturated pixels than on highly saturated pixels.

sect5.title: strength
sect5.para: This slider controls the strength of the effect.

sect5.title: mid-tones bias
sect5.para: Velvia can reduce its effect for mid-tones to avoid unnatural skin tones. The mid-tones bias slider controls this selectivity; reducing its value reduces mid-tone protection and makes the overall velvia effect stronger.
